This Flying V-90 Nuclear Yellow has a Mahogany 24 frets 25.5 inch scale (the same long-scale as the fender!) Neck in the body of the Mahogany 1958 style. Split diamond inlay is applied to the Ebony fingerboard, and the pickup has one Bill Lawrence designed Gibson the original HB-L. In addition, Steelberger made Leg Rest is adopted on the body side, so it is useful for sitting and playing. Black dyed Grovertuners and Hardwar series are unified in black.
